extendedInfo.description: The first app in the Even Monsters(TM) series is now free!* Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner* Kirkus' Reviews "Best of 2012" pick* Perfect. :) -- AppyDazeBlog* 5 out of 5 stars -- BestAppsForKids.com* An engaging story with the right mix of humor and lesson -- Common Sense Media* a fantastic app -- mummysspace.com* Top Pick for ages 3-7 -- smartappsforkids.com* Beautiful interactive storybook -- AppFavour.com* Delightfully interactive... This is a wonderful addition to your digital library! -- theimum.com* Beautiful illustrations, several mini games, excellent background music and sound effects, and well-implemented interactivity throughout the pages of the book...a great one to have. -- GeeksWithJuniors.com* Wow, what an awesome app! -- APPreciation************************Kids read, listen, touch, play and interact with Harry as he struggles to find out whatâs wrong with his new monster. Beautiful art, a custom soundtrack and full interactivity throughout keeps kids engaged and keeps parents raving about both the learning aspects and the endearing message built into âEven Monsters Get Sick.âReaders and non-readers of all skill levels will enjoy the wide range of features in this interactive storybook.***REVIEWER COMMENTS***"a true gem and a perfect example of why every family needs to invest in an iPad. I was hooked from the first page. If the Apple Stores held midnight release parties for new apps, Iâd be one of the crazies standing in line for this one." -- SmartAppsforKids.com"The imagery was gorgeous...delightfully interactive...a wonderful addition to your digital library!" -- theimum.com"Monsters. Great big monsters with great big floppy tongues. Canât beat âem." -- appsplayground.com***PARENT COMMENTS***"This was the best download ever. I just wish there were more books like this one since it is such a popular book in my class. Thank You soo much!!!""Wow, what an awesome app.""A MUST BUY BOOK!""Amazing book!"âAbsolutely LOVE the appâ¦it is on high rotation in my house.â***FEATURES**** 6 games that are intertwined with the storyline* Activities and fun surprises on every page* Teaches kids positive lessons about caring for others, and that everyone gets sick sometimes* Read to yourself, or hear the story read by a professional child actor* Full-color illustrations, interactive animations, and a custom soundtrackBrought to you by the same team that produced the hit app Zoo Train, the acclaimed Bug Games, and the ever-popular Giggle Ghosts!---------------------------------------Visit our site for more info on âEven Monsters Get Sickâ and our other apps!http://www.busybeestudios.com/games---------------------------------------***QUESTIONS? CONCERNS?***We have no way to contact you via a review - if you have any issues or questions, please contact us at preschoolgames@busybeestudios.com!Become a fan on Facebook:http://www.facebook.com/busybeegamesPlease help us to keep improving the book! Send feedback, comments and suggestions to: queen@busybeestudios.com***PRIVACY AND SAFETY***This app contains NO ads, in-app purchases, push notifications, tracking, or any data collection whatsoever.This app does contain a link to our website for more information, but is found only in one contained Parent screen which is separate from the game play screens.Busy Bee Studios is a member of Moms with Apps, a collaborative group of family-friendly developers seeking to promote quality apps for kids and families.

reviews.title: Daughter loves it but.....
reviews.comment: Recently the app has not been functuoning properly. The pictures dont complete or the sound continues and doesnt stop from one page to the next. But it is a wonderful story and really fun for my 3 year old. I love it too.
reviews.author: Carmen Murphy

reviews.title: Even monsters get sick
reviews.comment: Grandson loved this app and the story! Looking forward to more great apps from your company!
reviews.author: Terrie Fulk

reviews.title: Wonderfully imaginitive and interactive
reviews.comment: I thoroughly enjoy the concept of an interactive e-story book and this one is brilliantly done!  An enjoyable story for kids and parents alike with something to interact with on every page!  Love it and I\'m hoping to see more from your company soon!  Thank you!
reviews.author: amandarae range

reviews.title: What am I missing?
reviews.comment: The app starts, I get to the title page, but then nothing. I tried clicking and swiping at random, but that makes the app shut down.
reviews.author: Ruby Sinreich

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: My daughter and all of my students love this app! Many ask to do it over and over again. The story is cute and the illustrations are highly interactive. This is one of the best apps I have found. I would definitely recommend this app!
reviews.author: Chris M

reviews.title: Problems with downloading
reviews.comment: When I start the app it tries to download updated files but can\'t. It always stays 0% complete
reviews.author: Iraida Bashlak

reviews.title: Exellent
reviews.comment: So fun
reviews.author: Manuel Gonzalez

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Love the story, animations and interaction.
reviews.author: Michelle Nadeau

reviews.title: Worth paying for
reviews.comment: This book is awesome. My son has gone through it at least once every time that he touches the tablet. Mini games and interactive pages are fun and look great. Please please please release the rest!!!
reviews.author: matt chadsey

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: My son loves this interactive book.

reviews.title: Great app
